products.name: Sofa
products.description: Comfortable 3-seater sofa with plush cushioning and a modern design. Perfect for living rooms or lounges.

products.name: Chair
products.description: Ergonomic office chair designed for long hours of comfort with adjustable height and lumbar support.

products.name: Computer
products.description: High-performance desktop computer equipped with the latest processors and ample storage for demanding tasks.

products.name: Laptop
products.description: Lightweight and portable laptop with high-resolution display and powerful specs for both work and play.

products.name: Dining Table
products.description: Elegant wooden dining table with ample space for family meals and gatherings. Sturdy and stylish.

products.name: Desk
products.description: Modern writing desk with a clean design and plenty of surface area for your work essentials.

products.name: Bookshelf
products.description: Spacious bookshelf with multiple shelves for organizing books and decorative items. Ideal for home libraries.

products.name: Bed
products.description: Queen-size bed with a comfortable mattress and sturdy frame. A great addition to any bedroom for a restful night's sleep.

products.name: Nightstand
products.description: Compact nightstand with a drawer and open shelf for storing bedside essentials. Matches well with various bedroom styles.

products.name: Lamp
products.description: Table lamp with adjustable brightness to create the perfect ambiance in your living or working space.

products.name: Television
products.description: 42-inch LED TV with high-definition display for an immersive viewing experience. Perfect for movie nights and gaming.

products.name: Refrigerator
products.description: Double-door refrigerator with spacious interior and advanced cooling technology to keep your food fresh for longer.

products.name: Washing Machine
products.description: Front-loading washing machine with multiple wash settings and energy-efficient operation. Ideal for busy households.

products.name: Oven
products.description: Electric oven with convection feature for even cooking and baking. A must-have for any kitchen.

products.name: Microwave
products.description: Compact microwave oven with quick cooking capabilities. Perfect for reheating leftovers and preparing snacks.
